snippet: In the midst of Argentina's biggest currency devaluation in a decade, with the peso's plunge rattling financial markets worldwide, President Cristina Fernandez's first public address in weeks was silent on the matter....

headline.print_headline: Argentina Policies Adrift as Inflation Spiral Looms
headline.main: Argentina Policies Adrift as Inflation Spiral Looms

lead_paragraph: In the midst of Argentina's biggest currency devaluation in a decade, with the peso's plunge rattling financial markets worldwide, President Cristina Fernandez's first public address in weeks was silent on the matter.
